subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Visiting Barcelona again got the better of its archrival, Real Madrid, as Éric Abidal scored a rare goal to give his team a 2-1 win in the first leg of the Copa del Rey quarterfinals.
snippet: Visiting Barcelona again got the better of its archrival, Real Madrid, as Éric Abidal scored a rare goal to give his team a 2-1 win in the first leg of the Copa del Rey quarterfinals.
